record.field: for record in self: record['x_company_partner_id'] = record.partner_id and record.partner_id == record.company_id.partner_id

for record in self: event = record.x_calendar_event_id voting_key = event.x_voting_key_id if event.x_attending_ratio > 0 and voting_key: voters = record.x_attendee_vote_ids.filtered(lambda a: a.x_vote == 'In Favor').x_attendee_id.ids x_in_favor = sum(attendee.x_ratio for attendee in event.attendee_ids if (attendee.x_delegating or attendee.x_attending) and attendee.partner_id.id in voters) record['x_in_favor'] = x_in_favor / sum([x_ratio.x_ratio for x_ratio in voting_key.x_ratio_ids]) / event.x_attending_ratio else: record['x_in_favor'] = 0

for record in self: event = record.x_calendar_event_id voting_key = event.x_voting_key_id if event.x_attending_ratio > 0 and voting_key: voters = record.x_attendee_vote_ids.filtered(lambda a: a.x_vote == 'Against').x_attendee_id.ids x_against = sum(attendee.x_ratio for attendee in event.attendee_ids if (attendee.x_delegating or attendee.x_attending) and attendee.partner_id.id in voters) record['x_against'] = x_against / sum([x_ratio.x_ratio for x_ratio in voting_key.x_ratio_ids]) / event.x_attending_ratio else: record['x_against'] = 0

for record in self: event = record.x_calendar_event_id voting_key = event.x_voting_key_id if event.x_attending_ratio > 0 and voting_key: voters = record.x_attendee_vote_ids.filtered(lambda a: a.x_vote == 'Abstention').x_attendee_id.ids x_abstention = sum(attendee.x_ratio for attendee in event.attendee_ids if (attendee.x_delegating or attendee.x_attending) and attendee.partner_id.id in voters) record['x_abstention'] = x_abstention / sum([x_ratio.x_ratio for x_ratio in voting_key.x_ratio_ids]) / event.x_attending_ratio else: record['x_abstention'] = 0
for record in self: record['x_attending_owners'] = len([a for a in record.attendee_ids if a.x_attending or a.x_delegating])
for line in self: line['x_share'] = (line.x_amount / line.x_split_analytic_items_id.x_total) * 100 if line.x_split_analytic_items_id.x_total else 0
for record in self: record['x_share_total'] = sum(line.x_share for line in record.x_line_ids)

for record in self: if not (record.attendee_ids and record.x_voting_key_id and record.x_condominium): record['x_attending_ratio'] = 0.0 continue attending_ratio = sum(record.attendee_ids.filtered(lambda a: a.x_attending or a.x_delegating).mapped('x_ratio')) total_ratio = sum(record.x_voting_key_id.x_ratio_ids.mapped('x_ratio')) record['x_attending_ratio'] = (attending_ratio / total_ratio if total_ratio > 0 else 1.0)
